property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put 1 Mid-match from your Ringside into your Backlash: your opponent draws up to 1 card.

card.name: Revolution Slap the Taste Out of Your Mouth

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's Arsenal: put 1 into his Ringside and the rest on the bottom of his Arsenal

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Target 'chest' in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 1 card. Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 non-Unique non-Hybrid from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, if you have lower Fortitude than your opponent, you may discard 2 Maneuvers: this card has Momentum

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, if you discard 1 card and name a Target: this card instead has that Target when played.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn, if this card is in your Ringside, you may discard 3 cards: put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have at least 5 fewer cards in hand than your opponent: -10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 5 or more different Targets in your Ring: this card has Momentum. Draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put cards with Target 'neck' from your Ringside into your hand equal up to the number of Target 'neck' in your Ring

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal: put them on the top and/or bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 4 Antics from your Ringside into your Arsenal

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent puts up to 1 card from his Ringside on the bottom of his Arsenal. He cannot play Antics during his next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 card from your Ringside on top of your Arsenal. Put up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put 1 F:0 Core from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside: he draws up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, if you have fewer Antics in your Ring than your opponent, you may discard 2 Antics: this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, if you discard 1 card and name a Target: this card instead has that Target when played.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn, if this card is in your Ringside, you may allow your opponent to draw up to 2 cards: put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. Put up to 2 non-Uniques from your Ringside into your hand

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 20 or more cards in your Ringside: -11F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal equal up to the number of Target 'back' in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 4 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal 1 random card in your hand. Look at your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 1 card. Your opponent puts 1 random card from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. Your opponent discards 1 random card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent draws up to 1 card. Put up to 1 non-Unique from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, if you have fewer cards in hand than your opponent, you may discard 2 Reversals: this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, if you discard 1 card and name a Target: this card instead has that Target when played.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn, if this card is in your Ringside, you may overturn 4 cards: put this card into your hand

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Fortitude is at least 15 less than your opponent's: -9F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 5 or more Target 'back' in your Ring: your opponent discards his Backlash. Put up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If reversed: draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard up to 3 Extremes: your opponent discards the same number of cards

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 Extreme from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played by an Extremist: -1F. If reversed from your opponent's Backlash: overturn 3 cards and look at his hand

card.name: Revolution Struck by a Singapore Cane

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played by an Extremist: -2F. If reversed from your opponent's Arsenal: he draws up to 1 card and you may put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played by an Extremist: -3F. If reversed from your opponent's hand: discard 3 cards and search your Arsenal for up to 1 Extreme, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution Drive Opponent Through Announcer's Table

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played by an Extremist: -4F. If reversed: all players put 3 cards from their hand on the bottom of their Arsenal

card.name: Revolution Not What We Came to See!
Revolution Saw That Coming a Mile Away

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Same Target as 3 cards in opponent's Ring

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If the reversed card is Mean: discard 3 cards. If the reversed card is Colossal: put cards of D:1 or greater from your Ring into your Ringside until you have removed at least D:3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If the reversed card is Mean: discard 3 cards. If the reversed card is Colossal: put cards of D:1 or greater from your Ring into your Ringside until you have removed at least D:3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If the reversed card is Mean: discard 3 cards. If the reversed card is Colossal: put cards of D:1 or greater from your Ring into your Ringside until you have removed at least D:3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent is an Extremist: -2F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Overturned If you are an Extremist: ignore the Requirement.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 Unique, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose a Target: for the rest of this turn, all Targets in your Ring and all Targets on cards you play are only considered that Target.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Less Fortitude. Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card with the same Target as a card in your opponent's Ring, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Less Fortitude Put all cards in your hand on top of your Arsenal. Shuffle up to 10 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Greater Fortitude and Fewer Cards in Arsenal Shuffle cards of D:1 or greater from your Ring into your Arsenal until your Fortitude is less than or equal to your opponent's.

card.name: Revolution Not a Leg to Stand On

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 1 Target 'leg' in your Ring Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card with Target 'leg,' reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 2 Target 'arm' in your Ring Put cards with Target 'arm' from your Ringside into your hand equal up to the number of Target 'arm' in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 3 Target 'chest' in your Ring Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Target 'chest' in your Ring -1.

card.name: Revolution Don't Stick Your Neck Out

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 4 Target 'neck' in your Ring Draw cards equal up to the number of Target 'neck' in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 5 Target 'back' in your Ring Discard any number of cards with Target 'back': put up to that many non-F:0 non-Pre-match cards from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 6 Target 'head' in your Ring Look at your opponent's hand and choose up to 3 cards: he discards them.

card.name: Revolution It Has Everything to Do with Me

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Less Fortitude Your opponent puts cards of D:1 or greater from his Ring into his Ringside until his Fortitude is less than or equal to yours. He discards cards equal to the number of cards you have fewer than him.

card.name: Revolution Never Give In, Never Give Up

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Less Fortitude. Your next 2 Antics this turn have Momentum.

card.name: Revolution Double Your Value - Double Your Fun

property.name: Card Text
property.value: For the rest of this turn or during your opponent's next turn, your Fortitude is double the Damage in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you are an Extremist: put up to 3 Maneuvers from your Ringside into your hand. If you are not: put up to 3 Extremes from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put all cards in your hand on top of your Arsenal: search your Arsenal for up to 1 Assault, up to 1 Hold, and up to 1 Throw, reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution Where There's a Will, There's a Way

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Discard 3 non-Hybrid Maneuvers, Less Fortitude, and Your Opponent's Fortitude is 30 or Greater You win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 2 or more Target 'arm' in your Ring: your Maneuvers with Target 'arm' are +1D for each Target 'arm' in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 5 or more Target 'back' in your Ring and your opponent plays a Hold: he puts 2 random cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 3 or more Target 'chest' in your Ring and you successfully play a Maneuver with Target 'chest': put up to 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 6 or more Target 'head' in your Ring and your opponent plays a Throw: he discards 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Successfully play a Maneuver with Target 'leg': put up to 1 card with Target 'leg' from your Ringside into your hand and your next card this turn with Target 'leg' is -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 4 or more Target 'neck' in your Ring and your opponent plays an Assault: draw up to 1 card and he overturns 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn up to 7 cards. Put up to 1 non-Unique from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 1 random card. Reveal your hand to your opponent: search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-Unique Extreme not in your hand, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw cards equal up to the number of copies of this card in your Ring. Your opponent puts 1 random card from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal and draws 1 card. Put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution Taking It to the Hardcore Level

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 1 card. If your next card this turn is an Extreme, it has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 7 cards in your Ring with the same Target Choose 1: your opponent discards his hand or his Backlash. His Ability is blank next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played by an Extremist: -2F If reversed from your opponent's hand or Backlash: discard 1 card and he draws up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's Ability is blank next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand: he discards all Antics.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent skips his next turn.

card.name: Revolution Take It and Like It

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: At Least 10 Less Fortitude Discard 1 card. If your next card this turn is a Maneuver, it has Momentum.

card.name: Revolution Nobody Messes with The McMahons

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Less Fortitude Your opponent overturns cards equal to the number of different Targets in your Ring times 3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Successfully play a Maneuver: search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-Unique non-Follow-up Antic, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to the same number of cards +2.

card.name: Revolution On This Day, I See Clearly

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Fortitude is less than your opponent's: -8F.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Colossal: Follow-up: Maneuver or Unique

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 1 random card. Your opponent discards 4 random cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution I'm Not Your Damn Role Model

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 2 cards. Superstar Value: +2 New Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns, if you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent: put up to 1 non-Hybrid Maneuver from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand. Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution Everything Has Come to Life

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 10 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. Your next card this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You do not need to play a card before playing an Assault: Follow-up or Extreme: Follow-up.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 Assault: Follow-up or Extreme: Follow-up, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. If it is your next card this turn: it is -8F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 2 Follow-ups from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have fewer Antics in your Ring than your opponent: this card has Momentum.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Mean: Follow-up: Maneuver / Reversal: Antic

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand. Shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal equal up to the number of different Targets in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 2 cards. Superstar Value: +2 New Superstar Ability: You are considered an Extremist. Successfully play a Follow-up Maneuver: draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 Unique, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Unique

card.name: Revolution X-Treme Whisper in the Wind

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Follow-ups in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent successfully plays a Maneuver: put up to 1 Maneuver from your Ringside into your hand.

card.name: Revolution Get Ready to Burn in Hell

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 3 cards from your hand on top of your Arsenal: search your Arsenal for up to the same number of non-Unique Maneuvers, reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 7 cards. If your next card this turn is a Maneuver, it has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal equal up to your opponent's Fortitude.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards random cards equal to the number of different Targets in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Fortitude is at least 5 less than your opponent's: -15F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Value: -1 New Superstar Ability: If your opponent plays a non-Unique Antic, you may discard 1 Antic and 1 card: it is reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is in your Ringside and you play a Reversal from your Backlash: you may put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: put up to the same number of Uniques from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 Assault or 1 Throw: put up to 1 non-Unique Antic from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 3 non-Uniques with different Targets not in your Ring, reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution You'll Never Take What's Mine

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards 3 random cards. Put up to 3 Assaults and/or Throws from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent overturns cards equal to his Superstar Value times 3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand with a Target not in your Ring.

card.name: Revolution I Am the Legend Killer

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent is not a Legend: discard 3 cards. Superstar Value: +3 New Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns, if your Fortitude is less than your opponent's: put up to 1 non-Unique Maneuver from his Ring on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard up to 3 cards: your next non-Unique this turn is -9F for each card discarded.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Colossal: Follow-up: Card / Reversal: Assault or Throw
